ASSISTANTMESSAGE #167
## Status DONE ## What Changed - **`app.vue`** — added global `<style>` block with `@page { size: A4; margin: 2cm }` for consistent physical page margins - **`pages/index.vue`** — added `Export PDF` button (calls `window.print()`) in the header right-actions slot; added `@media print` rules that hide the header, editor panel, welcome screen, and collapse the dual-panel grid so only the preview renders - **`components/PreviewPanel.vue`** — added `@media print` to make the panel overflow-visible, height-auto, and cancel any zoom transform (`transform: none !important`) - **`templates/modern/styles.css`** — improved print section: `margin: 0` (defers to `@page`), `page-break-inside: avoid` on header/recipient/experience/signature, `orphans`/`widows: 3` on body paragraphs - **`templates/classic/styles.css`** — same improvements as Modern - **`templates/minimal/styles.css`** — same improvements as Modern - **`templates/executive/styles.css`** — same + `page-break-after: avoid` on the `<hr>` dividers so they stay with what follows - **`templates/creative/styles.css`** — same + `print-color-adjust: exact` kept on sidebar (purple background prints), `min-height: unset` for print, explicit grid retained - **`templates/resignation-professional/styles.css`** — `margin: 0`, avoid breaks on header/recipient/signature, `orphans`/`widows` on paragraphs - **`templates/resignation-brief/styles.css`** — same as Professional ## Key Decisions - Used `@page { margin: 2cm }` globally and reset per-template `margin: 0 2cm → 0` to avoid double-stacking left/right margins (4cm would be too wide) - Print chrome-hiding CSS lives in `index.vue`'s scoped block — Vue 3 applies the parent's `data-v-*` to child component root elements, so `.app-header` is reachable from the parent scope - `transform: none !important` in `PreviewPanel` is needed because the zoom is set inline via `:style`; `!important` beats inline specificity ## PR / Branch - Branch: `feat/pdf-export-polish` - PR: https://github.com/kimwwk/ohmydoc-using-claude-code-agent/pull/28
▶ VIEW RAW DATA 
{
  "content": {
    "type": "text",
    "text": "## Status\nDONE\n\n## What Changed\n- **`app.vue`** \u2014 added global `<style>` block with `@page { size: A4; margin: 2cm }` for consistent physical page margins\n- **`pages/index.vue`** \u2014 added `Export PDF` button (calls `window.print()`) in the header right-actions slot; added `@media print` rules that hide the header, editor panel, welcome screen, and collapse the dual-panel grid so only the preview renders\n- **`components/PreviewPanel.vue`** \u2014 added `@media print` to make the panel overflow-visible, height-auto, and cancel any zoom transform (`transform: none !important`)\n- **`templates/modern/styles.css`** \u2014 improved print section: `margin: 0` (defers to `@page`), `page-break-inside: avoid` on header/recipient/experience/signature, `orphans`/`widows: 3` on body paragraphs\n- **`templates/classic/styles.css`** \u2014 same improvements as Modern\n- **`templates/minimal/styles.css`** \u2014 same improvements as Modern\n- **`templates/executive/styles.css`** \u2014 same + `page-break-after: avoid` on the `<hr>` dividers so they stay with what follows\n- **`templates/creative/styles.css`** \u2014 same + `print-color-adjust: exact` kept on sidebar (purple background prints), `min-height: unset` for print, explicit grid retained\n- **`templates/resignation-professional/styles.css`** \u2014 `margin: 0`, avoid breaks on header/recipient/signature, `orphans`/`widows` on paragraphs\n- **`templates/resignation-brief/styles.css`** \u2014 same as Professional\n\n## Key Decisions\n- Used `@page { margin: 2cm }` globally and reset per-template `margin: 0 2cm \u2192 0` to avoid double-stacking left/right margins (4cm would be too wide)\n- Print chrome-hiding CSS lives in `index.vue`'s scoped block \u2014 Vue 3 applies the parent's `data-v-*` to child component root elements, so `.app-header` is reachable from the parent scope\n- `transform: none !important` in `PreviewPanel` is needed because the zoom is set inline via `:style`; `!important` beats inline specificity\n\n## PR / Branch\n- Branch: `feat/pdf-export-polish`\n- PR: https://github.com/kimwwk/ohmydoc-using-claude-code-agent/pull/28"
  }
}
